document_data.mainbody:
Owlroost Head was a hill in the Zehoarastria region of  Amn and the namesake of the Owlroost Head Inn in the town of Purskul.
Despite the inns location, Owlroost Head hill stood many miles east of Purskul.
The hills name was used as a password to enter the inns clandestine meetings of the Many-Fanged Serpent secret society. With time, the password became the inns name, and the Many-Fanged Serpent was thought to had been dissolved by the late 14 century DR.
